name: SpaceShooter (unkus)
description:
Hello everyone!

This is my first game on itch.io so, u can do suggestions , report etc.

Latest version 0.2.6!

To warp Home press H

To interact press "E"

To exit && enter spaceship press "J"

If you do upgrade you must on warpgate , in astranot and press e

Textures : Kenny assets and my arts
